div.bibl: Chicago Greek Daily, Jan. 1, 1932THE FEAST OF ST. NICHOLAS LADIES' SOCIETY

body.p: p. 1.- The Ladies of St. Nicholas parish are preparing for a sumptuous feast to be held in the hall of St. Nicholas church, Sunday, Jan. 3rd, in which, according to the Greek custom, the "Vasilopita" (Special New Year's Cake), will be cut.
The ladies of this organization, distinguished always for their kindness and politeness, will receive the guests after which there will be dancing and entertainment.
